definition: Meiling (female name)/Zhou Meiling 周美玲[Zhou1 Mei3 ling2] (1969-), Taiwanese gay film director
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
(onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as 玎玲 or 玲瓏|玲珑)/tinkling of gem-pendants

sentences.english: Hong Kong TVB actress Yung Mei Ling was discovered dead at her home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 香港無線電視演員容美玲被發現死在家裏昨天。

sentences.english: And he discovered Yung Mei Ling sprawled on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 他發現容美玲攤開在地板上。

sentences.english: The next day, Mei Ling cleaned the shop and made a lot of mantou to sell in the shop.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，美玲打掃了店鋪並且做了很多饅頭在店裏賣。
上星期颱風美玲來過了。

sentences.english: Star-hyun in his diary painted a portrait of Helen, to write poems.
sentences.chinese: 星鉉在自己的日記本里繪美玲的肖像，寫情詩。

sentences.english: Yung Mei Ling graduated from textile design faculty at Art College, UK.
sentences.chinese: 容美玲畢業於紡織設計學院在藝術學院，英國。

sentences.english: Zong Xuan is the attention that misses method to attract beautiful Ling.
sentences.chinese: 宗鉉則是想盡辦法吸引美玲的注意。

sentences.english: Also thanks to his relief, mei ling a life doesn't sound too bad.
sentences.chinese: 也幸而有他救濟，美玲一家的生活還不至於太糟。

sentences.english: Mei Ling sat next to him, her robe open, showing that she now had her legs crossed.
sentences.chinese: 美玲坐在他身側，敞開的浴袍，露出她交迭的雙腳。

definition: (onom.) ting-a-ling (in compounds such as 玎玲 or 玲瓏|玲珑)/tinkling of gem-pendants
used in the transliteration of people's names
